name: pin-missile
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Sharp pins are fired to
strike 2 to 5 times.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Sharp pins are fired to
strike 2 to 5 times.

at the foe and hit
two to five times
at once.
